---
title: "Resources"
---

Here you can find some 

- Install Obsidian from [https://obsidian.md/](https://obsidian.md/)
- Get the Obsidian demo vault for academic notetaking from [Github](https://github.com/selinaZitrone/notebook_demo)
  - Read the README file for a step-by-step guide on how to download and open the vault in Obsidian
  - Have a look at the "Get Started" files in the demo vault for explanations and step-by-step guides
- A good [tutorial video for Obsidian beginners](https://www.youtube.com/embed/OUrOfIqvGS4)
- [Obsidian plugin recommendations 1](https://www.youtube.com/embed/2zhnb9KwmtA?si=Pf-Z3Y76ghBW0xo7)
- [Obsidian plugin recommendations 2](https://www.youtube.com/embed/cBm95iCcX2E?si=uPCKGg32Q2V1AXvx)

- [Step-by-Step guide](https://elizabethbutlermd.com/obsidian-notes/) on how to get started with Obsidian in written form
- [Blogpost: Note Taking System For Success in Academia](https://ilyashabanov.substack.com/p/note-taking-system-for-success-in) using Obsidian
